package.name: barcs_qav500_sensor_config_2
package.description: The barcs_qav500_sensor_config_2 package is derived from marble's air vehicle system's submission. Sensor packages have been changed by barcs team. This sensor configuration has: - a 3D Lidar, (same as X1 medium lidar on underside) - an HD camera - air pressure sensor - magnetometer - Microstrain 3DM-GX5-15 IMU - 2 upward and downward point lidars based on the lidarlite
package.author: Derek Vasquez
Hector Escobar
